subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: With England already out of contention, Wayne Rooney said, “It’s vital we take the pain we are feeling now and remember that, and the next tournament, we don’t want to feel that again.”
snippet: With England already out of contention, Wayne Rooney said, “It’s vital we take the pain we are feeling now and remember that, and the next tournament, we don’t want to feel that again.”
